A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Two words: Flying Leia. It's truly a line in the sand. After seeing that cringey\, embarrassing\, disrespectful scene you are either in\, or out. And I'm out. Fans have put up with a lot of nonsense in the prequels\, Abrams' movie bought back a LOT of goodwill. This film takes a two and a half hour bowel movement on something that many people loved from their childhood.
